abstract: Op-Ed article by Pres Barack Obama calls gun violence sweeping United States national crisis that demands countrywide response; acknowledges sweeping gun control reform will not happen during his presidency, but points to steps he is taking with his legal authority as start; asks citizens and government officials to do their part in reducing violence; in particular urges higher level of accountability and safety standards in gun industry.
snippet: I will not campaign for, vote for or support any candidate, even in my own party, who does not support common-sense gun reform....
lead_paragraph: I will not campaign for, vote for or support any candidate, even in my own party, who does not support common-sense gun reform.

headline.main: Barack Obama: Guns Are Our Shared Responsibility
